title: Pixel 4a: In-Line Volume Controls Not Working
content:
Hi,

Just got my Pixel 4a yesterday, and I've found out that the in-line volume controls for my 3.5mm pair of wired Apple EarPods do not work. They work fine on my previous phone (iPhone 6s), but not the Pixel.

I can play / pause and sometimes skip songs with them, but the volume controls straight up don't work.

Is it possible to fix this somehow?
Thanks
